alert.note: Alert for Anoka; Hennepin; Wright (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 7:57PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Hennepin, central Wright, west central Anoka and southeastern Sherburne Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 757 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Becker, or 12 miles north of Buffalo, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Big Lake around 805 PM CDT. Albertville around 815 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include St. Michael, Otsego, Rogers, Maple Grove, Champlin, Corcoran and Medina. This includes the following highways... Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 181 and 205. U.S. Highway 10 in Minnesota between mile markers 194 and 217. U.S. Highway 169 between mile markers 159 and 163. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
